Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Feedback from the teacher is more reliable and more suited to my specific issue/question. The teacher also provides more specific feedback as opposed to more general/vague feedback from AI.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The feedback from the teacher is far more reliable and I find it easier to take this onboard as I know it is correct.
